block.p: National League PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Activated SS Freddy Sanchez from the 15-day DL. Optioned C Ryan Doumit to Indianapolis (IL).
Can-Am League NEW JERSEY JACKALS--Traded OF Brent Krause to St. Paul (AA) for a player to be named.

N.H.L. BOSTON BRUINS--Recalled C Nate Thompson from Providence (AHL) on an emergency basis. COLUMBUS BLUE JACKETS--Recalled F Curtis Glencross from Syracuse (AHL). WASHINGTON CAPITALS--Assigned D Mike Green, C Tomas Fleischmann, RW Eric Fehr and LW David Steckel to Hershey (AHL).
LONG BEACH STATE--Named Don Monson men's basketball coach. MARSHALL--Named Donnie Jones men's basketball coach.
National League PITTSBURGH PIRATES--Activated SS Freddy Sanchez from the 15-day DL. Optioned C Ryan Doumit to Indianapolis (IL).
Can-Am League NEW JERSEY JACKALS--Traded OF Brent Krause to St. Paul (AA) for a player to be named.
